title: Renew a Season Suite Lease
description: A sales representative is contacting an existing suite holder to renew their lease for the upcoming season.

tasks.description: Look up the suite holder's account and their current lease details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the account and notes the lease expires in 60 days.

tasks.description: Contact the client to discuss renewal and inform them of the new season's pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calls the client and presents the renewal offer.

tasks.description: Generate the renewal agreement and send it to the client for signature.
Once signed, process the deposit for the new season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the payment and confirms the renewal.
